Title: Mr. Greg
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Eric Bauza, Zach Callison, Deedee Magno, Tom Scharpling
Plot: Now owner of a massive fortune, Greg takes Steven to Empire City for a vacation, and Steven invites Pearl, despite the tensions between her and Greg.
